faqs.q: How many calories in a teaspoon of butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 36 calories per teaspoon of unsalted butter.

faqs.q: Is butter high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.6 g saturated fat per teaspoon, which is 13% of daily value.

faqs.q: Does salted butter have more calories?
faqs.a: No, calories are the same, but it adds about 30-50 mg sodium per teaspoon.
Butter has virtually 0 g carbs, fiber, or sugars per teaspoon.

faqs.q: How does butter compare to olive oil per teaspoon?
faqs.a: Similar calories (about 40 kcal for oil), but oil has no saturated fat or cholesterol.
